channel.title: Pi web client made and works but 1 question
channel.description: ok i used tragedy pk source and client and i made a web client also but in the web client its like nothing has any animation you can do everything u can do in the web client but like when you walk your legs dont move when you attack your arms don't move nothing moves everything just slides across the ground. and there is no teleport gfx no animation theres nothing lol. pleas tell me how to fix this
